content: What popular American sitcom, set in New York City and starring Jennifer Aniston, aired its final episode in 2004?

Ah, you're referring to "Friends," the hugely popular American sitcom that indeed starred Jennifer Aniston along with Courteney Cox, Lisa Kudrow, Matt LeBlanc, Matthew Perry, and David Schwimmer. The show was set in Manhattan, New York City, and revolved around the lives of six friends navigating through their personal and professional lives. It premiered in 1994 and concluded in 2004 after ten seasons, leaving a lasting impact on television comedy and popular culture.
